summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 regarding a request to obtain a scanned copy of a handwritten note found in Jeffrey Epstein's cell after his death. The emails discuss the logistics of retrieving the note from evidence storage and scanning it, with one FBI agent mentioning they were under the impression Epstein wrote a letter and gave it to someone.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The note in question was found in his cell; the email mentions he may have written a letter and given it to someone.

events.title: Request for Epstein's cell note
events.description: An email request is made for the FBI to scan a copy of a handwritten note found in Jeffrey Epstein's cell.

keyFacts: A handwritten note was found in Jeffrey Epstein's cell after his death.
The note was in evidence storage and required transport back to the city for scanning.
An FBI agent mentioned being under the impression Epstein wrote a letter and gave it to someone.
The email chain indicates coordination between the FBI and another office (likely the U.S. Attorney's Office) to obtain the note.
The request was made in September 2019, shortly after Epstein's death in August 2019.
